title: 98/333/EC: Council Decision of 8 December 1997 on the conclusion of an Agreement on trade in textile products between the European Community and the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 8 December 1997 on the conclusion of an Agreement on trade in textile products between the European Community and the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia (98/333/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 113 in conjunction with Article 228(2), first sentence thereof,
Having regard to the proposal from the Commission,
Whereas the Commission has negotiated on behalf of the European Community an Agreement on trade in textile products with the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia;
Whereas this Agreement should be approved,
main_body:
The Agreement on trade in textile products between the European Community and the former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia is hereby approved.
The text of the Agreement is attached to this decision.
The President of the Council shall give the notification provided in Article 17(1) of the Agreement (1).
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 December 1997.
For the Council
The President
J. POOS
(1) The date of entry into force of the Agreement will be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities by the General Secretariat of the Council.
